name: .4 File Extension
summary: Learn about .4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: In Unix-like OSes, you can open a 4 file by calling the man utility using the name of the file. For example, to open mouse.4, enter man mouse(4).
Since 4 files are plain text files, you can also open them in any text editor, such as Vim (Linux, Mac), Microsoft Notepad (Windows), and Apple TextEdit (Mac).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
